title: Fix character count progress bars to update instantly on typing

requirements.summary: Update CreateChatroomDialog component to calculate character count percentage directly during render instead of using useEffect, ensuring the progress bar for topic input updates instantly as the user types
acceptanceCriteria: Topic input progress bar fills immediately on each keystroke
No delay between typing and progress bar update
Percentage calculation happens inline in the render, not in useEffect

file_operations.description: Remove useEffect that sets topicPercentage state and calculate topicPercentage inline during render as (topic.length / TOPIC_LIMIT) * 100. Remove topicPercentage state variable. Update the progress bar to use the calculated value directly.
